I made this spiral animation as part of my first exploration into digital art using R.

```{r, echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, include=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(randomcoloR)
library(gganimate)

a <- 0.1
b <- 0.2

theta <- seq(0, 10 * pi, 0.01)
radius <- a + b*theta
max <- length(theta)
col <- randomColor(max)
size <- seq(0, 3, length.out = max)
spiral <-
  tibble(n = 1:max,
         x = radius * cos(theta),
         y = radius*sin(theta),
         s = size,
         z = col)
p_spiral <-
  spiral %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x,
             y = y)
         ) +
  geom_point(aes(color = z, size = s)
             ) + 
  theme_void()+
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black"),
        ) +
  transition_time(n) +
  shadow_wake(wake_length = 0.9, size = TRUE)

```
